text: Ilanz/Glion is a new municipality of the district Surselva in the Swiss canton of Graub√ºnden. On 1 January 2014 the former municipalities of Castrisch, Ilanz, Ladir, Luven, Pitasch, Riein, Ruschein, Schnaus, Sevgein, Duvin, Pigniu, Rueun and Siat merged into the new municipality of Ilanz/Glion. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official Website Category:2014 establishments in Switzerland Category:Municipalities in Surselva Category:Cities in Switzerland
title: Ilanz/Glion
